identity.mission: Create a high-trust, production-ready website for City Medicos that breaks the 'generic medical' mold while remaining accessible to the elderly.
principles: Fusion over Imitation: Swiss Medical Precision x Neighborhood Warmth
Content is King: Phone numbers and 'Call Now' buttons are the heroes
Zoom In: Big, legible text and clear, high-contrast actions
Negative Space: generous padding to reduce cognitive load
Contrast: High contrast (Black/White/Orange) is mandatory for visibility

theme.core_concept: The Digital Signage - Big, Bold, Direct

rules: Body text must be at least 18px (text-lg) for elderly readability.
Use heavy weights (600/700) for key information like phone numbers.
Line height should be generous (1.6) for body text.

usage.primary: Main Brand Color - Use for Primary CTAs (Call Now), Borders, Highlights
usage.secondary: Trust Indicators - Medical Crosses, Success States, 'Open Now' tags
usage.text: Almost Black (#1F1F1F) for sharp readability against white

strategies: Mobile First: Stack everything vertically on mobile.
The 'Bento' Grid: Use mixed span sizes for categories.
No Floating Elements: Everything must feel grounded and solid.
Border Heavy: Use 1px or 2px borders to define areas instead of shadows.

buttons.primary: bg-[#FF4A1C] text-white hover:bg-[#E03A10] rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-xl font-bold transition-transform hover:scale-105
buttons.secondary: bg-[#1BAA5E] text-white hover:bg-[#148F4D] rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-xl font-bold
buttons.outline: border-2 border-[#1F1F1F] text-[#1F1F1F] hover:bg-[#1F1F1F] hover:text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 text-lg font-medium

cards.style: bg-white border-2 border-[#F0F0F0] hover:border-[#FF4A1C] transition-colors p-8 rounded-xl

navigation.style: Sticky header, white background, distinct bottom border. Massive 'Call Now' button in nav.

visual_enhancers.textures: Subtle noise overlay allowed on colored backgrounds to prevent flatness.
visual_enhancers.icons: Phosphor Icons (Bold or Fill weight) - Medical Cross, Phone, WhatsApp, Pill, Truck
visual_enhancers.decorations: Geometric Medical Crosses patterns in background (opacity 5%).

images.strategy: Authentic, Warm, Local. Avoid sterile stock photos where possible.
images.placeholders: Use colored blocks with bold typography if specific image is missing.

motion.hover_effects: Simple color shifts and scale up (1.02x). No complex 3D flips.

accessibility.contrast: Strict WCAG AAA compliance for text.

instructions_to_main_agent: Do not use gradients or shadows. This is a flat design constraint.
Use the color #FF4A1C as the primary brand color. Do not use Blue.
Prioritize the phone number: 9873341450. It should be visible at all times.
Ensure the layout is mobile-optimized first.
Use 'Outfit' font for headings and 'Public Sans' for body.
Implement the 'Bento' grid for the category section.
Use the mapped image URLs for specific sections.
universal_guidelines: Create depth through layout and borders, not shadows.
Use 2-3x more spacing than feels comfortable.
Missing categories = placeholder text is FORBIDDEN. Use abstract shapes or solid colors if needed.
